scripts.lint: npm run lint:apex && npm run lint:doc
scripts.test: sf apex run test --result-format human --output-dir ./tests/apex --test-level RunLocalTests --wait 20
scripts.test:coverage: sf apex run test --result-format human --output-dir ./tests/apex --test-level RunLocalTests --code-coverage --detailed-coverage --wait 20
scripts.precommit: npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.retrieve:pkgs: sf project retrieve start -n "Apex SOQL Builder" --target-metadata-dir packages -z
scripts.scratch: sf org create scratch --definition-file config/project-scratch-def.json --alias trigger-weaver --duration-days 7 --set-default --json
